title: Talk Therapy
description: Talk Therapy combines the empathy of therapists with AI to deliver affordable, 24/7 mental health support. Unlike other therapy bots, our AI is supervised by therapists who review and personalize your therapy journey, ensuring meaningful progress. With instant AI responses and therapist-guided care, you get real-time support when you need it most. Talk Therapy bridges the gap between convenience and human connection, making therapy accessible, effective, and empathetic—at a fraction of the cost.
